Reviews.Title: Awesome!!! Great Sound,
Reviews.Author: L Garcia "ELEL"
Reviews.Content: I have this LED T.V for about two months now. So far its Great! Wow... Awesome pictures, really sharp colors and the sound is way better than most expensive LED T.V's. Whith 6 Primary colors, while most have 3 or 4, it also have 16 surround speakers!!!. I wasn't sure about Mitsubishi at first, because they are known better in cars, but I found out they have been making T.Vs for a very long time now and they are more popular in Asia. My T.V is always at work everyday, more than 8 hrs a day I'll say... not sure why it got bad reviews and didn't work with others. I will buy Mitsubishi again. It saved me almost a $700!!! I was really going for a Samsung or Sharp. Well, they are all Japanese company... Good thing I listened to the sales man in the store.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME PICTURE AND AWESOME  FEATURES
Reviews.Author: M. A. KELTZ
Reviews.Content: I have owned this TV for several months and love the vibrant picture and sound. I added a powered sub and it replaced my 5.1 surround sound system. My wife loved the sound but hated all the extra speakers in the room so this TV fit the bill from the start. I would highly recommend this tv and the brand name.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money!!!
Reviews.Author: biggie97
Reviews.Content: Unit failed after 2 months of very light use. I had the dreaded Mitsubishi blinking green power light issue. From what I have read this is a very common problem, I even had the unit plugged into a surge protector. They tell me that the internal power supply blew out. The Repair shop can not get the Main PCB that blew out in a timely manor so thankfully I am getting a store credit. I will go with my original plan and get a Samsung.
